text: Qasim Akhtar (born 8 June 1991) is an English actor, known for playing Chesney Karib in the hit Channel 4 comedy-drama Shameless (2007–2013), and Zeedan Nazir in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (2014–2018, 2021–present). He is from Burnage, Manchester, in North West England. ==Other websites== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Manchester
title: Qasim Akhtar
